review: As you can see I have a lot of hours in this game. I refuse to look at it at this point. Its pretty rewarding when you win but you have nothing to show for it when you do. Stats are erased monthly or something. It's literally just playing just to get coins to unlock loot boxes that will give you the 5th shirt in a row. Was kinda fun at first but eventaully it just gets repetitive. Nothing to keep you interested game's mostly just based on luck and what you can loot. If you're thinking of buying this game because you watched shroud get 16 kills in a game and it looked fun dont. Game is mostly just landing looting running for miles until you get shot from nowhere from a guy with a supressor. Devs suck and like I said the game gets boring. I would have a lot less hours but my group of friends were addicted to this game until they too got bored of it. No incentive to keep playing. Try Fornite honestly at least its free and there's a building component to it.

Maybe give it twelve months? The issue then however is that the game will likely be completely dead.

review: Pubg overall is a great game and has great art direction. However the constant influx of chinese players on NA EU and other servers make the game unenjoyable. It constantly prevents communication especially in random duos and squads and is taken advantage of by hackers and more. Additionally in the start of the game the rubber banding is outrageous and you can barely move or pick items up for around 5 minutes easily allowing you to get killed leading to skewed statistics and a less enjoyable experience overall. If fixes were in place to prevent such problems and there was a better anti cheat and the rubberbanding is fixed this game would become amazing however where it stands right now (even with the 1.0 version on the test server) it is not enjoyable and extremely agitating to play.

review: The game itself is good and enjoyable to play. The issue is that despite the game being popular and out for some time there is a truly ungodly amount of lag. I have a stable connection with decent speeds and this game is forever lagging. People lag through doors being closed fist fights and can be stood still through an entire clip of an Uzi before they band to the other side of the building and kill you.Then there are the bugs. Holy God the bugs. People are clipping through everything guns randomly don't work and you can be firing madly through your scope and be hitting nothing but dirt because the game thinks you're prone when you are stood up.Not recommended on the sole basis that the developers seem to think that because it's popular they can sit and release a new map and forget that this is still early access and full of issues.

review: I am currently writing this review covered in human feces below Brookdale bridge. I've lost all control of my life. I lost my job my relationship status along with all of my 44 canadian/latino childeren. Every morning I wake up in fear of lossing my life to the cold. This winter has been brutal. Yet among all of these variables I find a shread of joy in destroying my enemies in Battlegrounds. Even though I fight for my life against a band of homeless men seeking to steal all my Christmas tree ordiments while my stomach aches from starvation .. my larges life regret comes not from stealing all the hot pocket sleaves from Walmart frozen food section or releasing my baby cannon on Philip Seymour Hoffmanfrom's overcoat while he wasn't looking at a local Applebees. No my largest regret comes from not purchasing this game sooner. Winner Winner Chicken Dinner. 5/5

review: Ahhh pubg. Some days you hate it's guts other days you feel like a badass. So let me start this review off with the fact that pubg is a Battle Royale game mode. 90 100 Players go in 1 comes out holding a banner that says "Winner Winner Chicken Dinner". So if your expecting it to be anything like COD or Battlefield let me clear up the air. It's not at all like either of those games. In pubg you go from building to buidling looting up getting in little skrimishs with other players over loot and slowly building up your gear. There is currently 2 maps in this game but there is places in these 2 maps that to this day I still have not explored. And keep in mind that each game you have one life. If you die your staying dead for good. And thats one of the reasons I find this game so much fun The Tension. Spending 10 15 minutes getting your favorite weapons then be in that tense situation where you might die and lose it all. It's heart pumping and very exciting. Even better if you play with friends. You are going to yell and scream at each other but trust me it's really nice to have someone watching your back and you don't have to poop your pants each time you get shot at from no where. As you can probably tell I love this game. But thats not too say it dosent have issues. There is a plentiful of bugs and glitches in this game not too even mention the obnoxius hackers that you might meet from time to time. But my number 1 issue with this game is the Price Point. It should in no way shape or form be $30 for this much content. There is 1 mode 2 maps and a handful of weapons. This game should be 20 25 dollars hell some could argue it could even go for 15. But there really isn't any games I can think of that really and I mean REALLY get your heart pumping. Each time I get top 10 I my pants. And there is no better feeling (besides shoving your donger into your dogs lubed up ) than winning a match. Knowing that you beat all those other players that out of the 100 players that went into that match you came out the king. The gunfights are fun and intense (Although most of the grenades are useless). Each major city has it's own feel to it (although nearly a lot of buldings share the same layout). The cars.... well thats not the finest point this game has as the driving is next to Watch Dogs in terms of quality....This game is amazing it really is. If the devs are smart it can live for ages as it has so far done better than any other Battle Royale game. Are you going to have moments in which you want to bash your skull against your desk at least 10 times? Yes. Is there going to be times that you want to beat the everliving out of that that just stole your win? Yep. But the game is damm fun even when your not having the best of luck. So do I recommend it? Heck Flippen Yes. Just try to atleast have one friend that also has the game. If I managed to encourage you to use your 30 bucks that you went through blood sweat and tears to obtain slap a comment and Heck I'll even play some rounds with you. So some wise words before I blast. Always down teamates Gilly Suit is broken as heck make sure to make as much noise as possible and pan is god tier.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: First of all I absolutely love this game even though I often express my hate via shouting verbal abuse at my screen because of how rage enducing this game really is!But that is besides the point I think that this is one of the best games out on the market at the moment and if you have enough to get it then if I were you then i would definitely purchase it! If you are considering buying it then take a look around for some gameplay there is plenty of it by now. One person specifically i can reccomend would be Aculite he is mainly PUBG based and puts out a new video everyday so you will never be short of PUBG content.This game is amazing when played by yourself and amazing when played with some friends all round a decent game. However there are some things that need to be fixed such as Desync but I think most games have that so it's nothing out of the ordinary it could also do with being a little bit better optimised but that's nothing that time can't fix when the devs fix it up. If you are looking for something fresh and new that gives you and adrenaline rush and a sense of adventure then this is definitely the game for you! If you purchase this game based upon my review then happy gaming!

review: I have been playing this game for over 20 hours and have experienced a certain number of issues and bugs. My main issue is that every time I drop into the game the map doesn't fully load and a lot of textures and buildings are missing. It takes about two minutes for the game map to load in and by that time other players have the opportunity to collect loot while I sit there and wait. It isn't just my game either other players have posted on forums that they have the same issue. I asked my friend who has played the game longer than I have and has told me many players have the same issue. He gave me a few methods to try and solve this issue but none of them has worked. I hope that this issue gets fixed but until then I am going to stop playing this game until I see more improvements.

review: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY Game is over run with Chinese hackers (teleporters / aimbots) Lag from 150+ ping from lack of region lock (shots don't hit target) Base game unstable &amp unfinished (regular crash to desktop) Developers unable to fix game breaking issues (many games are unplayable)Yes it might look good on Youtube but you've watched a polished video. Getting killed by hackers ends most games (someone appearing behind you in a closed room or a sniper shot with a handgun) skyhigh ping makes simple tasks like walking through doors or picking up weapons frustratingly impossible the program physically crashes to desktop at least once a session requiring a full PC restart and because developer Bluehole is rushing to put PubG on Xbox the major issues in the PC game aren't being worked on or fixed. Buy it if you want but be aware you're buying an unfinished potato that will make you want a refund once the shiny new game feels ware off.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I'm sure this game was developed with good intentions but they simply don't deliver.The only outstanding piece of this software is the sound model that helps with bullet tracking. Asides from that it's another shooter wrapped in bugs shipped before release and now the developer is asking for more money with DLC.I never should have purchased this game though I second guessed my gut feeling to play with work friends.I do not recommend this game. It lacks polish has poor network code and isn't representational of a war shooter. The company responsible is probably up to their ears in server hosting costs which is why they're pushing for DLC revenue this speaks to a game that isn't sustainable.Don't waste your money on this. Go buy a paintball gun if you want to have fun with a shooter.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I voted this for my custom "Most Boring Game I've Played" catagory for a reason. Lets start from the begining the plane ride. You gotta make sure that no one else is going where you are because if you don't you'll get killed with a shotgun from a different house. Then if you find a good place to loot you start wel looting. Since the loot is randomized you have no idea about what kind of loot you're gonna get. You'll look around for a good 5 to 10 mins looking for a back pack and it'll usally be level 1. You'll search far and wide for either first aids a scope or a car. Speaking of cars if you're one of the lucky guys who landed in the circle like I said you're lucky! If you're not then you gotaa run run alot. The game pretty much just becomes a walking simulator. If you do find a car you'll usally get shot up in the first 1 5 mins of riding it. If you do get in a top ten situation its alot of waiting and just being prone. Then after 10 mins of that you'll get domed by a fully stacked level 3 god or streamer. So honestly this game is a waste of time and money. I kept going back to this game hoping praying that it'll get better but it never did. Its also full of glitches I don't wanna get into cause this review is already super long. 2.75/5 Stars.

review: Its free for all with 100 people and you have to find all of your gear. Think Halo but you start with nothing. You have to find everything in the world such as Weapons Attachments Ammo Clothes Vehicles and Consumables. The map will shrink every few minutes and push people into a small circle each time or you die. You only get one life so be prepared to be when you die to glitch bug or hackers. Its early access and the stability of the game shows it. Honestly there isn't much to the game but has a lot of replay value. I'll come back when its more stable.It also has bad press due to some BS that doesn't really matter. Go watch someone play on youtube for 5 minutes and you'll know if you want it or not. Otherwise would recommend.

review: No other game has drawn me in like this game has. The simple nature of this game hides a very complex underbelly that rewards trial and error. Every gun has a purpose every step could mean life or death. Every move you make could be your last. Play this game is rewarding and beyond frustrating depending on luck. There are problems with the game but this game is in early access. Some problems are listed below. Poor performance Hackers and cheaters Poor server performanceThere have been some gripes about the Gamescon paid loot box however no skill items can be gained from those boxes. Only cosmetic items. The developer promised no paid boxes before early access and the promise was broken. The developers have weekly and monthly updates adding in balance patches more weapons and a new map with new vehicles. However the developer seems to focus on eSports rather than fixing the game. eSports should be the very last thing addressed however the developer seems to want have eSports before a stable well optimized game. Overall I would recommend this game if you have at least two other friends to play with. Even with the issues I have made my money back from playing this game by selling loot boxes in the Steam Market. I believe the issues will be addressed soon when the full release comes out.

review: I will keep my early access review simple and mostly in comparison to H1Z1 KOTK Pros Awesome graphic engine A variety of weapons Cool looking vehicle/character/weapon models UI is simple to understand Less clutter Large beautiful map Matches are not long. You can be done with one and jump into another almost immediately Allowing players to choose where they want to spawn A whole lot less "buggy" Great responsive developers (constantly working on patches/updates)Cons Graphical optimization (FPS drops/stutters) Server issues despite joining one that is relatively close to meVerdict Great overall. Best "Battle Royale" style of a game that you can find out there. Newcomers can easily get into this. Fight it out and have fun!*Despite the cons provided the game is still in early access and developers are trying their best to work on these issues.

review: Even though H1z1 and Battlegrounds are in the same genre theyre still pretty different.H1z1 is more arcady and action oriented while Battlegrounds is more tactical and slower paced. I like to compare it to other shooters. H1z1 feels like Call of Duty you basically dash around looking for kills. Jump out of driving cars shoot while moving/jumping and lesser logical things. It has a smaller variety of weapons and is more simplistic.Battlegrounds on the other hand is more like Counterstrike. Its more tactical and aim intensive. Small mistakes cost your life. Jumping out of driving cars hurts/kills you. Randomly shooting around gets you flanked fast. This game is more complicated with a bigger variety of weapons and add ons.This game has way less development time compared to h1z1 and already feels much more solid while h1z1 already has a more solid playerbase as of right now. I honestly prefer this game over h1z1 as of now.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The (almost) perfect mix of arma and H1Z1. Best battle royale game I've played. For an alpha it's sure advanced little to no glitches way less than h1z1 which is funny because this game just came into alpha. I started by playing th solo gamemode which took a while to get you used to. Ctrl+T is useful to mute people in the waiting lobby from ear you. After my 7th game I finally placed first. I decided to play squad with 3 other random people and every pair I got matched with was really fun and supportive! 2 times in perticular were really fun because I got put in a twitch streamers group and another time I got put in a hardcore clan's group (but they were really nice even though I was too shy to talk) I carried them anyway 7 kills for the win baby nah they helped out a lot too. Everyone is 1000x nicer on here than most other games and there are very few glitches from my perspective it's just the occasional lag which once in a while (rarely) your in a gun fight and one of the dude's goes zipping around but it's not that bad. Unlike other battle royale games it's much more forgiving and you can hop right back into one and people don't run up to you and muder you instantly with a shotgun like in h1z1 unless your being dumb and go in the most populated area. Overall it was the most fun I've had in a game since Halo Reach came out and It's very nice for alpha honestly I wouldn't mind this being the final game product because its already better than h1z1 but there adding more loot and making more fixes and so its going to be even better which makes me happy!
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Pros Addictive as hell. Often find myself saying "Just one more game" Finding/joining games is fast and easy. Usually join a 100 person server under a minute. The ever collapsing ring of play keeps action focused and fast paced. Cons Servers can be *very* laggy sometimes to the point where you teleport in one place and can't move anywhere. Related to latency sometimes you can't pick up items/enter vehicles reliably. Since this is early access the game engine isn't fully optimized so FPS stays in the 60's even on lower settings. Still this game is fun as hell and gets you into the action fast.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Although this is a good game that I have had a lot of funs with a few problems hold it back from being truly great. To start the game is riddled with bugs and hackers but that is to be expected of an early access title and hopefully they will get ironed out by the time the game is released. In addition the battle points (BP) the you receive is heavy skewed toward queuing as a solo player with them receiving more the two times the BP as people in solos. This creates a system where you are punished for having friends. Lastly you are locked in a solos duos or squads the problem being that the game can but does not support differing amounts of people like 3 or 5. Now I know that the game can t have to many squad size options but at least don t make a group of 3 queue vs teams of 4 it s unfair and unnecessary. In conclusion I like the game but cannot recommend this game is its current state.

review: This game was popping up on every social media. Every friend of mine was playing this game so I had to buy it. I have a very slow internet with 3 mbps speed but for some reason this game lagged. A couple of my friends said that it is due to my laptop and some of them told me that the game is lagging due to my slow internet. Unfortunately I had to request for a refund of this game. I played it for 1 hour but the issue was that i joined the game where there was just 10 20 secs left that could be due to my internet and during the landing just on reaching close to the land my game always got froze. I went up ahead and used my mobile hotspot which gave me aroung 30 mbps speed which is still decent speed but the issue was still same. At this point of time I don't know what to blame. I hope there is a bit stability fixes so that I can play this because this is one of my best games which I want to play. My laptop was on high performance with my antivirus not running and it was plugged in too. I have a i3 4010U 1.70GHz processor with 4 Gb RAM and a 2 Gb integrated graphics card. I have sniper elite 4 running in low setting without any lag and GTA 5 on low without any lag. Please tell what need to be fixed

I don't recommend this game due to the rampant cheating and clearly since you need to be the last one standing to win that is impossible with the large amount of cheating players who are aimbotting and blind scopping people. review: After testing through the BETA &amp Finally today purchasing and having now just finished my first full game on official release here is what I have to say in a few bullet points. Price is a little high for an EA Game however if you don't want to pay 28 you can go to the official site and pay through them and only pay 25 The game is amazing it's like another world. It looked amazing on lowest settings gun play is on point as &amp the overall combat is really intense and how it should be they really nailed it with the PVP. However perhaps they should consider removing rain as it causes FPS drops and the game is not yet optimized. Pressing tab causes a few seconds of a freeze that puts you in a very vulnerable position. ESPECIALLY if you're like me and play double monitors. Otherwise amazing 10/10. This is the game I've been waiting for.

review: The game has nice realistic gun mechanics(real tight view of iron sites and ACOG chevron crosshair functions) compared to insurgency. But for gameplay wise the optimization at the moment needs improvement even with high end PC hardware trying to get at least 120 144 FPS is diffcult. For low end systems the typical FPS drop exprience walking around in the open FPS only improves when you are near &amp looking at a surface any scope above the red dot will kill your FPS. As for audio for the sake of realism it's quite loud lowering your volume will make it diffcult to hear good luck.It's going to take lots of practice just to get it right because you need to be checking tons of angles/corners while running around(this includes checking for players at a extremely far distance(if you play on low settings good luck with that) and getting used to aimming at moving targets that are very small(compared to other games I've played) will take practice(for some situations you need to aim a little further ahead of their direction they are walking in) There's no practice range unless you get into the lobby and pick up guns avaliable.The wide open field design of the main map + long range scopes + powerful guns that will kill you it's not fun. The game is filled with hackers at the moment that kill you with 2 bullets from an SMG vs someone with full armor. The only fun you will have is either camping and waiting out for atleast 30 50 players killing each other off to make it to top 10 or going for roadkills for your whole match.This game is pretty much hunger games with guns(due to the many players camping in various) and DayZ on steroids.The game isn't ready to be at full release and it's going to take until the end/near end of 2017 just to fix everything before it goes into full release in 2018. With all of it's unique features bugs and livestreamers abusing their privilege of getting people banned for "stream sniping" it's ridicolous you can be a streamer call out someone for doing said action even though they didn't they still get banned. As for custom games it's understandable they want to make that feature special and exculsive by having streamers host them(it's like a special occasion) Custom games isn't avaliable to everyone else until full release. There's no gamemode for practicing aim either. You'll just have be lucky and get into a streamer's game or volunteer to test stuff if you have some who can host.'As for feedback from the community. The next patch tends to come around every week(assuming they want to get as much feedback before next week) But again it's not a good idea to wait a whole week to relase the next patch they should of double checked before releasing their next patch update(s) The typical thing tends to happen next patch is released more bugs arise next patch will have to wait until next week and not 2 or 3 days frfom that day. For features that people want. I'm clueless as to who they listen to.The price of this game it's not worth 36.99 CAD
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Got convinced to buy it because friends rated it so highly. Held off in the past as it apparently ran terrible but with the latest patch now "runs and looks great".How wrong they were.Runs decently enough on high/ultra but still looks absolutely terrible. The sound is pretty horrific. Whilst the gun sounds just 'ok' everything else sounds utter garbage. The game engine feels like I'm playing Day Z back in the day when it was an ARMA mod. Everything feels so awkward and clunky. Animations look again awkward.I get this isn't a tripple A blockbuster game and it's in constant developement but in its current state I wouldn't recommend. It's going to take a hell of a lot of work to make this look and play like a game that was made in 2017/2018. Save your 30.FINAL UPDATE After sinking over 300 hours into this game and now trying the Blackout beta there is genuinely no reason to keep this game installed. This game is clunky and slow by comparison to the fast and fluid play of Blackout. Never thought COD would be able to do a decent BR but they've proved everyone wrong. PUBG's vision will never be realised. The dev team isn't capable of polishing up the game when the foundations the game is built around are so terrible.Slow uinintuitive movement. Vaulting feels awkward. Rewards players for sitting and hiding but hey thats 'tactical' right? This game won't withstand the onslaught of tripple A devs implimenting BR game modes into their games. PUBG will always be here but I think if the game survives with 100/200k peak players consistently it could be deemed a success.

review: This game was a lot more fun when it was in early access back in june since now with the 1.0 patch the few guns that were fun to shoot are now nerfed to the floorr for example the m416 is the only viable assault rifle option for close and min range combat the SCAR and the M16 are relatively good for close range combat but their muzzle velocity (bullet speed) received a big nerf if you shoot a target that is 400 500m away it will take your bullet around 2 seconds to reach wich doesn't feel fun nor realistic since those guns should have a muzzle velocity of around 870m/s... So basically a lot of guns are not good anymore and gunplay feels rather boring now.Another important point to mention is the abundance of BUGS and the poor server performance you will encounter in this game. You might join a game where everything goes perfect no lag no rubberbanding but then you will join a different match where the rubberbanding persists until there are 80 players remaining.And the final point probably the most important one THE CHINESE...No matter what game mode you play or in what server you are you will find a pretty good amount of cheaters and i bet you 80% of those will have a chinese name in the many hours i've spent playing this game with friends we have been wiped out multiple times by one of these scumbags and the worst thing is that the creator of the game seems to dislike the idea of the quickest solution you can implement to stop this problem which is region locking.But i guess the game has its good things kills are somewhat satisfying playing with friends is really fun Q times are very fast and you can make a bit of money off crates.And if you're wondering why i have so many hours played in this game its simply because i play with friends D

review: when i bought this game it worked. smooth frame rate good sounds didnt crash and i actually got an english speaking teammate occasionaly. Now the lag is nearly unplayable making gun fights a frustrating experience and the sounds are so messed up its leaving my ears aching as gunfights and even just running around produce this horrible crashing racket as if every possible noise made on the map is all being directed to my ears. In a 5 hr game binge i can expect the game to crash multiple times. I literaly go days without an english speaking teammate in the north american servers. At first i thought the region lock crys were a bit dramatic but no region lock this Also get it working again you c u n t s its Dayz all over again.

review: ok graphics. gameplay that gets repetitive as hell. parachutes barely works you will get stuck all the time. Hackers paradise. without region lock you will be paired with people that dont speak your languge so you cant coordinate. the game crashes half the time when you start to do some little things. most the guns feel the same. picking up stuff off the ground becomes a hassle when somebody is moving on you most the time you pick up the pants instead of the shotgun. clothes mean nothing but they are littered across the entire game. The developers dont fix anything in the updates they just put in more cloths and change how the hud looks.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: A unique last man standing shooter game. Press the play button and you get a seat on an airplane with 100 players with you. Airplane flies on the island and you may jump at the moment you want. Arrive your destination loot gear up and kill others to become the last survivor.I personally enjoy the PUBG's game engine as it has its own mechanics unlike any other FPS/TPS shooter game. It feels just so realistic that you could play this game for hours and you wouldn't even realize it was a game. Even driving the car and motorbike feels great.Although average updates takes 3 5GB's and minimum 1.5GB this game is highly recommended.Playing at 40 60FPS with HD7850 on 1080p + "Very Low" settings.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This is a great game i have taken hours and played over and over again. It is simaler to king of the kill but i think that it brings enough to the table to purchace it even if you aready have H1Z1. Aswell the dev support is good and i dont see them leaving this game in the dust. Only problem i have is is that on the plane when you start people can talk and are often foul mouthed so if you have kids that want to play the game maybe just turn of the sound for the start. Overall i would recommend for anybody who likes this sort of game i think its done well and has a good future ahead of it.

review: The game seems quite promising even in this state so I hope that the developers wouldn t become over confident and slower the update cycle or in the worst case seize the updates.The gameplay seems quite fun with friends and alone.+Visually nice+Vehicles handling is surprisingly realistic+Nice variety of guns and attachments+Servers and matchmaking are doing well even at this point of early peak of users Desync while spectating Inside vehicles and while spectating the audio seems to get swapped 180 degrees or so You can t see the full map while spectating Grenade physics Lacking a rank based matchmaking (this would add more interest into competitive gaming)Also I would like to see more maps which would be maybe similar to this one but with differences OR randomly generated map.Here we can see ladies and playboys how video game marketing is done right. (not pointing finger towards DayZ or anything)

review: Can't recommend this you need a headset and absoloute silence to play this otherwise there are NO indicators NONE AT ALL where you are getting shot from.For the sake of realism you are NOT allowed to know which side of your body has 20 bullets in it!If you use normal speakers and watch tv / youtube / whatever all day don't expect to locate your attackers...Also the whole server lag thing or whatever is causing that thing where you shoot a whole magazine into someone and they are still alive is just ridiculous. The developers say they don't want the game realistic? Then why make headshots deadly? A shot in the Head is NOTHING speacial! It's a completely idiotic thing that emerged from some dumb old memes... When you give someone a headshot what does it do? SUPER kill him? Why not a throat shot? spine shot? heart shot? And if the head is so vulnurable... then why not actually cover more than 20% of your head with a nutshell? Why is something as UNIMPORTANT as a heart protected by a vest while your INCREDIBLY important brain is protected by garbage?Seriously screw you developers! No matter how you turn it emptying a Micro UZI into someone and then getting headshot by that person with a freaking PISTOL is beyond ridiculous. Just a joke how i literally NEVER die when i run over open fields but when i am in a cover and shoot at someone who i BARELY see through 2 windows and 20 obstacles that person INSTANTLY turns around and headshots me...Freaking fix your problems with the game already and stop the t EA excuse. You sold your game we demand that you make it actually playable. Shooter with 1000 ms ping servers are NOT playable. Shooter with cheaters in them ALSO NOT PLAYABLE!!!

review: Despite all the negative reviews this game is actually FUN to play. Tons of potential. This is Early Access game. What else do you guys expect? Fully polished game of the start? I just hope this game won't get stuck in Early access for like 5 years. Pros No grind. What ever i do in this match will have zero effect on next match. This is big for me because players that have played this game for a while don't have any advantage over anyone.(except knowledge and skill.) Hope it stays this way. Patches and Updates means Devs did not just drop this game. Cons Yes there is plenty of work to be done optimizing game performance on lower end of hardware. Jumping. Jumping over something like a fence is just terrible in this game. Want game to look good or lower graphics settings to be able to spot people? Don't like to choose between two of them.

(GTX 960 i7 6700k) and still at 50 fps on LOW. I can assure you right now this is not just because of my computer because it wasn't like this when it first came out and many other people are having the same problems as me. I feel like I'm falling in a ditch when I play this game and at times the servers can be very laggy and you will have terrible d sync. Overall give it a 4/10 score. I will probably not come back to this game unless they fix the following listed issues optimization(server and fps)D syncNow that is pretty much it BUT those things make a huge difference of how the game plays.

review: Niche title with too much RNG to feel rewarding. Skill doesn't really matter since the game is already overrun with professional tryhards who still lose to potato players due to random factors like bad spawns bad circles or just bad luck. The developers want this game to be the next big competitive genre like moba games became but I doubt it'll never happen. At least not with this game. Maybe one day we'll get "the perfect battle royale game" but not yet. Save your money.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: The Game Playerunkown's Battlegrouns is a fun fast action survival game. It contains a similar nostalgia to games such as DayZ. As you jump out the plane and descend to the island you look around to make sure no one will get to the loot first. You play quickly to gather supplies to gain advantages in gun battles. The gun battles are mostly intense and as you get close to victory every gun battle means more. You attempt to play from the shadows and only engage when needed. Finally it's down to a handful you lay down in the grass and crawl 100 meters to get into the next zone......... This is where the game lacks there is no skill involved it's simply a aim battle or you get shot in the back. This needs adjusted possibly to make the point always close onto a town? This would spicy up gameplay and make it much more interesting even allowing the circle to change sizes near the end of the game would be great. This would allow a sniper to be an effective gun near end game instead of people blindly throwing grenades. However I will most likly continue playing this game for the laughs i have with my friends. Nothing is funnier than messing with others!Thoughts on the Company Bluehole Inc. fell short when critizing Unreal for adopting the Battle Royale gamemode into their own game Fortnite. The engine used to create PUBG is Unreal Engine and critizing the company who gave you rights to use your engine is sad. Epic's Fortnite looks fantastic and attempts to add in a new spin when it comes to theiir version of Battle Royale. You can quickly build cover and weapons function completely different than other "Battle Royale" type games.The history of PUBG is a very interesting but as many recall H1Z1 created their own version of Battle Royale as well. PUBG was the furthest from the first and the whole concept is based off a movie to begin with.*This idea was not an original conept to start with*This game is honestly just garbage
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Alright so lemme just say this game is AMAZING. It takes skill its not pay to win it is very slightly luck (to the minimalist) and can become very heated and intense. Lets start with the pros.Pros The 4 things I listed aboveGood aiming mechanicsGood weapon balancingUpdates that keep the game freshLoud sounds so you can hear where an enemy isTHE MUTE TOGGLE.Meh Decent driving physicsGood sounds (but sound noises dont really matter as much as how well you can hear them so I put this in the meh section)Cons Bad accessory balancing. (Backpack level 1 3 Helmet level 1 3 Vest level 1 3)Cars unbalanced as hell (WHY DO YOU NEED A MINIBUS THAT DRIVES AROUND THE SPEED OF A CRICKET)Bad hit registration.Streamers in general cause a lot of issues in the community causing false bans sometimes.Pretty rough on bad computersOverall the pros outweigh the cons in my opinion hit registration isnt as bad as in CS GO or anything just a little off putting. In general yeah I would definitely reccoment this game as it is fun to play with friends some random who sucks at the game and solo.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Play area kills me more than other soldiers many games are spent chasing a blurry blue wall then getting killed by it unless i luck out with a vehicle that doesnt flip over on a few pebbles in the dirt...Pros Large Community Variety of Weapons Equipment &amp Vehicles Quick Match Making Sound Quality is great Adrenaline Pumping SituationsCons heavy on cpu usage so many of you may struggle on higher settings even though you have a BADA** GPU Randomly Crashes to desktop at times (Think it's Cpu Overload on my 6700k). Midnight 7am central time typical to see Overload of high ping users on NA Server (May be what's causing lag bringing up my inventory menu at times) Jumping &amp Melee Mechanics Could use polishing especially over obstacles like half broken walls small fences etc Shrink zone is a bit much at times. It's a cool concept but could use a little polishing on timing and health loss. maybe longer countdowns and less health loss at the end... UI bugs make you constantly have to refresh the menu Servers get overloaded on the weekends and you cant connect half the time

review: This is a good game i have so much fun with my friends howewver there are many flaws to it. Now that it is released i decided to leave a review. First off i love this game I have had many intense situations where ive come out both dead or victorious. That being said there are many things still wrong with this game. Ex 1. Vaulting does not always work2. wtf are the chineese doing on the NA servers? they lag so much and just scream at you in chineese as you kill them! Have you devs actually played your game on a public NA server? There are 99 people and 67 of them are chineese half way across the globe. make it so it auto detects your region.3. Why are people allowed to make it so the grass and trees dissapear three feet from them? I can have a guille suit and be hiding in the grass in a bush and someone 100 meters away snipes me with an m16 and when i look at the death cam thier foilage was set to extremely low and their view distance too and they can see a hairy guy laying out on a polygonal hill.4.inconsistancy. From cars to grenades you name it it is inconsistant. I can be behind a wall 3 rooms away from a grenade and it can kill me. I can be driving on a motor cycle and all of a sudden on a paved road i flip out of controll and die.5. I get that you cant catch the hackers before they play or until you get a report but please let us send a desc of what happened in the death cam.

review: PUBG is one of those games that takes a while to learn but once you do it's an extremely rewarding game. No other game out there can come close to replicating the feel you get when you're among the last 10 alive or when you're driving through the red zone with all your squad mates. It's a really fun game and at 30 dollars I think it's very fairly priced. Although there are some occasional glitches and bugs the developers have not only been slowly but surely fixing pubg over time they've been adding real features that have improved the game siginificantly. Overall I think this a great game and worth the buy

(unfortunately). and if some people are worried about performance get a pc that can run it. people are always whining about performance issues cuz they have a crap video card thats either underpowered or 5 years old. its gonna look and run like sh$$ if you dont have a decent pc. i understand some people cant afford a 1080ti or new i7. and its early access. its not finished yet. so if your looking for a finished game this isnt for you. for me the game is really fun and communication is key if your in a squad.

review: I have to say PUBG is amazing! It is not perfect (after all it is early access but it is damn close) but outside of the little bugs and such this game is just so much fun! The concept is so simple but so enticing and you just want to keep going back for more. I just purchased PUBG about 2 weeks ago and have over 60+ hours played already (mind you I have a full time job and family I support) and I really wish I had bought it sooner. I am having a total blast. I have personally been playing in 1st Person I feel it is more challenging and no 3rd person camera advantages. (My kids have some friends that will only play in 3rd person so I have played some 3rd) But not trying to take from either mode they are both just so much damn fun. The RNG hates me but even so I am still just truly having so much fun with PUBG.This game is growing so fast and I now understand why. 611 676 All time peak as of 8/13/2017.I would strongly recommend this game!BTW the Chicken Dinner is delicious too it s even more delicious if you can have it all to yourself in a solo matchEnjoy!

review: This game is a hot mess from a technical standpoint. Was looking forward to enjoying this game after playing PUBG mobile but thought a PC version controlled with the mouse and keyboard would be an amazing experience. How so wrong I was from the moment I downloaded the game I had tried every possible solution to solving the stuttering that occurred ingame. Every few seconds a microstutter would occur and cause your character to jump around slightly this in an intense firefight would mean you are on the losing end 9/10 times. This leads on to the optimization of the game NOT GREAT my pc specs are quite high and can run GTA at 1440p no problem. I have an RX 480 8GB version with a i5 6600k and this game totally destroys all hope of being able to run it smoothly even with everything on very low settings I was unable to hit 120fps the refresh rate of my monitor and I can tell you the game is not graphically exciting in anyway.As for the gameplay the controls were tight and the whole concept is intriguing but held back by its technical flaws I was never truly able to appreciate its beauty. If the problems were resolved in a later update then I may consider repurchasing the title to give it another chance. As for now I DO NOT recommend this game as it will give you more headache than enjoyment. For the price its not a bad buy luckily I was able to get a refund or I might as well have thrown that money into the sea and just forgotten about.For now just enjoy the free of charge nature of PUBG mobile as they have done a terrific job of fitting a game of that size into a mobile genre aside from the mediocre controls that a touch screen can provide its an enjoyable ride with friends.Hopefully they get their act together and sort out the mess that is the PC version however doubful that may be as they have found ways of making more cash from the xbox and mobile versions.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: TL DR if you want to shoot people and don't like wasting time on t play Counterstrike or Battlefield.Gameplay spend 2 minutes queuing up and parachuting down land away from your team mates spend 2 minutes looking for a weapon maybe wound 1 guy get killed by his squad. There is no ing reason you can't just spawn on the ground with a weapon and save 5 ing minutes of your life per match. Weapon damage is random weapon range is completely inadequate for a game based on a large open world map it feels like you are trying to play a Battfefield map in Counterstrike. Like CawaDoody this game caters to filthy casuals by making luck a huge factor in gameplay since you rely on finding randomly placed weapons to fight randomly placed enemies.Performance You get random lagspikes and rubber banding in pretty much every match annoying but not unplayable. The game looks like absolute on ultra with horrible object pop in and vomit inducing aliasing for a game where you have to stare into distance a lot this is completely unacceptable.

review: This game takes you back to the start screen every time you die. It might seem petty but going through 3 loading/connecting screens before a actual match even begins to load is really stupid. If there was just a button that put you in another match when you died/lost it would he much smoother and much less agonizing. The playable area shrinks really fast. There's nothing like spending the entire play time running to a safe zone just to be told that's it's shrinking again. Then getting shot in the back by someone who has the same issue as you but slightly worse. Cars aren't common enough. Which really is a blessing as much as it is a curse. Overall I think the game will turn out really good when it's done. But right now it's still rough.

review: I have played many EA titles and this seems to be the only one I have ever played where the updates have actually improved the optimization of the game. It is by no means totally optimized or even remotely close to being fully optimized but I have seen actual improvement from when I bought the game at release which is a good thing. I would ignore the people with less than 50ish hours complaining about hackers and RNG being terrible and what not. Obviously there are hackers but they are few and far between. The RNG part of it just as often gives you the win as it gives you the loss.The only thing to me that is currently making the game less fun is the huge latency/ping issues going on. I already love the game in its current state (im a battle royale junky) but if you are somebody frusturated by latency issues in its current state you may find a lot of frusturation. However as I said earlier the updates are actually making the game better and not just pushing out as much content as possible (i.e. ark) and the game already feels better than even a month or so ago.

Monthly updates they do listen to the community whether people choose to believe that or not if there is a problem with the game they tend to fix it within a few hours. They add what we want yeah they added creates you can still unbox normal ones that are free and don't cost anything to open you don't have to buy them it's only clothes.But the game is amazing other than the vac wave after summer sales cs go was unplayable at ranks higher than lem due to the amount of hackers and nothing was being done instead of fixing lag and hit boxes valve added gloves and more ways to make money. Battlegrounds is the best of it's kind in battle arena genres evident by the sales and positive reviews. I shouldn't have to go into why this game is amazing other people have already done that. But stop saying you don't recommend this game because of the micro transactions that make no difference to the competitiveness and play of the game. If people want to buy keys for clothes they will. You don't have too it doesn't effect you you can still get the other creates for free.

review: Have been on the fence about this game for quite a while. It went on sale for Steam summer sale.... "Ok I'll check it out" I think to myself. Unfortunately I never got to check it out other than seeing it download install title screen connecting wheel of BS and message telling me "Servers are too busy. Please try again later." I spent 30 minutes total trying to connect. On top of that i even uninstalled restarted PC and reinstalled in case was a bug. Nope.... "Thanks for your money but you will have to wait to play the game you just paid for." I sit here and think " hmmmm 100 million players $20 / pop MINIMUM ...$2 000 000 000 ...But servers are too busy. Maybe Playerunknown is spending all that money sueing the s*** out of people who are actually trying to make decent games in this genre.... Makes me even sadder that Radical Heights producer went up.Dont buy this crap.....Running a $6000 custom built rig with 1080's and what little of title screen I saw was running at 45 FPS with NO MOVEMENT on the title screen. Nvidia Experience suggests running the game at low on everything in 4k except textures which were set to Ultra....Uhm wtf?I am truly astounded this has the player base it supposedly does with this kind of operation of the software.If you buy it you will have to wait for the 100 million 12 year olds and twitchers to pass out and be forced to bed by their neglectful parents who apparently use this kusoge as a babysitter. Otherwise enjoy reading "Servers too busy" and clicking reconnect endlessly.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: I love this game because there is nothing else like it... but that said... it's the most broken laggy awkward piece of garbage game I have ever played in my life. And yet... I am totally addicted.The devs constantly release updates making this game worse and worse... breaking things and nerfing / buffing guns in ways that make the gameplay stupid and frustrating. You can spend months learning the backwards and unrealistic weapon system they have created only to have them turn everything upside down and turn you into a noob again. On top of that gameplay dynamics (like the bullet drop system) are broken in ways that make me sick. For example If a person if strafing while ADS (walking VERY slowly side to side) and you put your crosshairs on their head from 50 yards away your bullet will miss. Sure they tried to take into account bullet speed trajectory ballistics and moving targets... but they failed so miserably trying to make this aspect of shooting ANYWHERE NEAR reality that it's not even funny. Using sniper rifles (or any rifle at range) is so laggy and delayed that they are practically unusable. Not only is this worse than ANY first person shooter I have ever played it is laggy and inconsistent which makes it even worse. Also with NO ping matching system in effect you are playing against people who have faster pings than you (a MAJORLY UNFAIR ADVANTAGE in close quarters combat) and people with slower pings than you (Which makes combat awkward and unreliable since they are shooting at you or at least where you were 600ms ago which makes you able to die when you are around corners and behind cover.) This is the result of client side hit detection laggy crap servers and pubg being too afraid to region lock the servers to keep players on the servers that reside on the continent that they are playing on. Clearly PUBG Corp is just in it for the money and won't do pingmatching or region locking (like EVERY OTHER FIRST PERSON SHOOTER ON THE PLANET IMPLEMENTED 20 YEARS AGO) because they're too afraid to off their largest customer base China. Chinese players cheat the most and play on NA servers which makes fighting them very frustrating and unfair (due to the reasons mentioned above). But hey China has the most customers which means the most $$ to milk out of people with their rip off crate **SHOULD BE ILLEGAL** gambling system and now even bigger rip off season pass.All in all this game is unlike any other game which is why it is still popular but the company is clearly 1000% just in it for the money and try their best to ruin the fun for everyone. Mostly every development they have made in the last 9 months has been CLEARLY just to milk the players for cash while neglecting to fix OBVIOUS problems and ignoring their players' feedback.I CAN'T WAIT until another developer makes a similar game (realistic graphics loot etc) that doesn't have these money hungry bastards behind it who seem to be master marketers and amateur coders. Until then I guess I'll keep putting up with this laggy broken scam of a game because hey... There's just nothing better.

review: THE ONLY REASON someone would give this game a negative review is because they have not been playing long enough to figure out the learning curve. Yes it takes time to get good and figure it out. When i first got the game I would rage quit constantly. YOU NEED TO PRACTICE!! If you have bad performance maybe turn your resolution down! This went from one of my least favorite games to I can't stop playing this game. I even play with a xbox one controller yet i am still ranked in the top .86% on solo third person perspective. That's my entire career playing this game even with letting friends play for hours and my first 50 hours of getting slaughtered. TRUST ME... this game is a solid 9/10 by now with all of the updates and effort the developers have put into making it better. The only thing i would ask for is better controller support (I can't set my aim down sight setting to left trigger hold). And also $2.50 for a key to unlock a crate? come on... you would be making plenty of money charging $1. But most of these things end up getting fixed. This is absolutely one of the best games that has come out in years so don't listen to the troll reviews

review: The game itself is promising but the current state of it is garbage.Half of my review centers on the fact that it is the most demanding game out there resource wise (Because it has barely any optimisation). My specs are just a bit above the minimum requirments and for me it's still unplayable AT TIMES. I can get decent matches sometimes. I like that the DEV's keep on trying every month to make it better but I was expecting heavy optimization focus month by month. Performance wise it's barely any modification..... even if they say they make great imrpovements. That's 1/4 of the patch notes. The rest (3/4) of the patch notes are game balance changes (Why isn't this postponed until the game runs decently?) new maps (Why isn't this postponed until they get close to the full release?) or new mechanics (Why isn't this postponed until the game runs decently?). Answers for all of this is simple. A lot of people (With good PC's bought the game now. They will focus on delivering content for those that can actually play the game. So great for you guys be happy enjoy it. I will have to stay and wait for 6 months to a year maybe until I can play it decently.The other half of the review centers on other issues Ghost bullets + Ghost punches (I'm so tired of dying just because the server doesn't register the shots/punches) Worst possible clunky mechanics for melee weapons. Throwables (Grenades/Smoke grenades/Flashbangs) are utterly useless in my opinion. By the time you position and throw a grenade you can be shot 2 or 3 times. The throwing mechanic is just bad. Hackers. I understand they are trying to deal with them but they just keep popping back out.Pro's I find it enjoyable to drive the bike. It can get to a decent 100+ km/h speed. Not the most realistic crashes/jumps but it's fun. When I'm tired of the points I listed above I just drive until the circle is too small and the players with good aim kill me. I just wanna drive and be free man.....All in all it's a good bike driving simulator. (Until its full release).... (Or whenever it will playable)
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game lags so pathetically badly. When you drop from the plane in the beginning and land good luck hitting anything moving because either you the enemies or both are teleporting all over the screen because of desync between client and server.Then there's just the plain latency with the game. You can use this website (https //pubg.disquse.ru/) to test your ping against their servers. If you have more than 150 200 ping on any server steer clear of that region. There's literally only 2 servers on that entire list that gives me less than 150 ping and you cannot choose which server you play on. Only the region.Then there's the item spawns. The item spawns are so pathetically and are spawned procedurally. But because of massive lag and desync when you land a lot of times the game doesn't even spawn weapons in that area. I have played so many games where I literally clean out several houses and can't find a single gun. Or if i do it's almost always a handgun. Not to mention because items are spawned procedurally the developers and dictate whether or not you get good loot spawns or not by just turning down the % on certain guns loot table for your account.The desync causes massive problems when you're shooting at enemies. You could unload half a magazine into someone then suddenly die and guess what. You probably did no damage to your enemy because the game didn't even register your shots.This game is ridiculously broken. Aside from the lag and desync then there's bugs.There's a damage bug where even if you have full level 3 armor and helmet you can still take full damage from whatever gun you're being shot with. There's also bugs where you can get stuck in rocks stuck in walls and doors. There's texture bugs where people can't even see buildings and can see players running around in buildings through the walls. Then there's cheaters. People aimbot wallhack you name it. People also glitch the game where they can stand inside the ceiling and shoot you through the floor and you can't even really see them except just barely parts of the soles of their feet that are clipping through the floor.Do not buy this game if you're looking to have fun. It isn't ready and Bluehole should not be charging people money for a game in this state.If you're wondering how bad the lag is see below https //www.youtube.com/watch?v MLZKMZzVnsshttps //www.youtube.com/watch?v 8ZzijG1Dkpkhttps //www.youtube.com/watch?v rEL51EX18s8https //www.youtube.com/watch?v o0s1WZ 97O0https //www.youtube.com/watch?v J5y2k41MDeg
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: 2/5It's an okay game needs a lot of improvement before the final release. Game loses connection to the network often or has other bugs such as unable to enter doorways.Although you can switch the mode by default your automatic weapon is a single tap weaponMy last biggest issue with the game is why don't the devs add a simple kill cam? When your down to the last few or sometimes even halfway you'll get sniped from somewhere faraway and never know where you were killed from.With all these issues aside it is a fun and enjoyable game to pass the time however I would not recommend this game until some serious improvements are made.

review: So one night me and some friends went out for a night of partying at one point we choose to go back to my place and continue our little drinking session so we get to my place and in my drunken state i turn on my pc and see that this game is on sale.Drunk me then proceede to say it and asked one of my friends who i knew had the game if it was any good? in which he was very quick to say it was one of the greatest games he has ever played so after hearing that drunk me choose to buy the game and i quickly loaded up a few rounds to just learn the controlsLet's skip forward to the next day right? i get up take a shower and all that and i turn on my PC to see that drunk me bought this game.So now that i am pretty much sobered up i choose to take a proper game and see how long i can last and if it's any fun so i load up a game. And i get myself some gear which was an AK a pump action shotgun and an M9 Beretta.I also picked up a helmet a bulletproof vest and yada yada.After then running for around 15 min without seeing anybody and trying to stay inside of the force field so i don't die i finnaly see a guy all by his lonesome which i starts to shoot at with the AK.Somehow i manage to hit everything but him? so i hide behind a tree to change to my shotgun and he suddenly comes jumping around the tree which i was hiding behind he then proceedes to take a few shots at me and i die?So i am now dead and all i now see is he starting to teabag me and nacking my before running off into the wild to kill more people.....First game went as smooth as it could ever go.... 10/10

review: Product received for free. A great and fun game. I suck at shooters due to some colorblind and poor sight issues but with this game I can bring things close quarters enough to where i can find/see people enough (especially with how loud moving around is). There is only one life and as soon as you die you can move on to the next game. There is virutally NO WAIT TIME for matches when searching ever. The devs have so many plans for this game that are crazy amazing. I used to play H1Z1 KotK (some) and this FAR outshines that game (along with the weird similar one Ark had made). It is still i nits early stages but already is great. I have a not so great processor and can run it decently on bare minimal settings (though sometimes I have a render issue at the beginning for a minute or so). After some research found out the game can at times use 8gb of ram (which is all the ram I have). It's a very thrilling and exciitng type of game. This is better thanany crappy call of duty or battlefield game any day and anyone who tells you otherwise just needs to get gud. Devs are VERY GOOD with banning and taking care of modders/cheatters and any problems with servers including bugs anmd such they fix very qucikly and address almost right away. There is no pay to win aspects the only thing you can pay for is crates that will give you some cosmetic items that do nothing more than be cosmetic. Games have 100 people in them typically and you choose where you drop in at from a plane going across the map. I'd say 8.5/10 just because opitimzation issues are a thing currently and can be bit bad for ppl with lower end processors or ppl on just high settings even when capable of running those settings and highly recommend for sooter fans and peopole who like one life only survival games.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Let me start off by saying that the game has potential it definitely does but could I recommend PUBG to you right now? Definitely not and here's why The game is filled with bugs ranging from glitchy textures to game crashes after every couple of rounds Performance. I get that it's an Early Access game and they all come with performance issues but I feel like we should be asking more from a dev who certainly has the money and tools to fix this. Sound. So apparently you can get tinnitus from playing this game? If that's not a sign that something needs fixing then I don't know what is. Lag and latency issues. In a game like this where every second you could get shot from 15 different angles and your reaction time is crucial de sync and lag issues shouldn't be a thing it should be the first thing that the devs address. Instead we're getting 50 more pants and t shirts and the de sync isn't going away anytime soon. GreatSo yea wait for a sale (although that might not work out all that great since the game is releasing soon and is going to cost 60$ instead of 30$) or play with friends that way you can atleast have SOME fun.

review: I love this game.Nothing gets your heart racing as much as this game unfortunately it is plagued with I don't know what to call it unless it is hacked.loss of audio from from a single headphone channel and plagued with enemies that I can't seem to hit with all the advantages that can possibly be gained from every item avaliable from the game.If this isn't aimbotted I don't know what else could explain it and as much as I enjoy it and despite getting into the top 10 20% of the time I have never won a game.I would just warn players that if there was ever a chance of winning it is perhaps dimished by what I could only measure as some god like ability that you could never have a chance of countering.My best place of #2 was meet with some godlike countering abilities at the very least and the fact I haven't made it further only adds to my conclusion that there is perhaps some players altering the odds in their favour.I think there is nothing quite like this game unfortunately made unplayable by whatever it is that is making the odds of winning so unlikely my time is better spent elsewhere I will in the future invest in a console version hoping this will be rectified but I will forever be suspicious that this game is not tweaked to advantage a certain few.Is it worth your money probably but is it worth your time probably not.Just to add you need a hefty graphics card to play this game I haven't had much trouble as meeting the graphics standards with anyother game than this one with an amd rx460 you can expect to run the lowest settings at 1080p and pretty much every other game medium to high to ultra I think this game desperately needs optimisation.Glad I can get away with playing this at the lowest settings but so many other games look soo much better and detail it makes me wonder where the focus is perhaps this is something the developers will delve into later but it seems almost a crux point when it comes to playability.

review: The game has so much potential but small easily fixable things ruin it for me. In PUB there are zones that you have to make it into in order to continue living. If you get caught outside said "Playzone" you begin to take damage. Well even though he has made changes they are still broken. The final three circles do NOT have enough of a duration in between shrinking you don't even have time to get into a single firefight. By the end of one fight you are dying to the playzone with no time to med. This alone ruins the game for me for now I won't be touching this hopefully he see's the players' and streamers hate how this feature works. Nevermind the mess of optimization issues making this game totally unplayable for many of my friends. It's better than H1Z1 but still not great.

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: Spend half an hour looting and running to get killed randomly It's a fun game but they need to include another way of motivating to play. I have won multiple times and the game isnt rewarding anymore / My suggestion is adding a ranking system similar to h1z1 with rewards which will make us want to go back and play it constantly anyways my old review is below VVVVVV After sinking in over 100 hours I think I have came up with my view and thoughs of the game which I have neatly displayed below ) The dev's have showed really good progress doing optimisation updates nearly every week now and constantly updating the game making it more enjoyable.Overall the game is a really high adrenaline fast paced version of the originial battle royale if you ever played that on Arma 3.Gun play overall is really good. There will be moments when u think a death is BS or something doesn't work probably but that just comes with a early access game.People moaning about micro transactions are actually stupid. This game does offer them but in no means is it "selling out" or "pay 2 win" it's just offering an easier way to get the cosmetic items you want.Final Verdict 9/10 Solid game really fun can't wait to see what they make of it in the future.

review: This game.......you hear a lot of cheaters I ve come across a few. But not so much that I feel I need to spend my whole review complaining. One thing I noticed is the US servers is where you find a lot of cheaters. But playing on the Asian servers I haven t come acrossed too many. Aside from hackers this game is exceptional. Once you get the hang of it it s hard to play anything else. Get into the top 5 for the first time I guarentee you re going to be on the edge of your seat heart pumping hands clammy and adrenaline overflowing. Your first Chicken Dinner you re going to jump out of your seat with our hands in the air feeling like you won the lottery and prolly talk about it the rest of the day to everyone you encounter. It s a fun game to play with a crew of your friends where you can develope chemistry and routine techniques. I rate this game a 9.7 .

title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: When I frist started playing this game I really enjoyed it and wanted to get better at it. I found the iea of parachuting in and then working with whatever you found to be exciting and loved the feeling of finding some great weapons and armour and then going about seeing how long I could last.Graphics are pretty good but frame rrate does drop sometimes but the game is only just out of early access so I expected all this. What I didnt expect was for the game to suddenly stop working after the last patch. Now it gets to the opening credits and crashes nearly every time. When I do get to play (about once in twenty loads) the game will crash once I try to exit back to the main menu and back we go again to trying many times for a lucky chance at playing the game.Many people seem to be having problems with the game and thats why I cant recommend spending 26.99 on a game that is probaly going to cause you issues somewhere. I hope they sort this game out soon but right now save your money.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS

review: This game has some of the most satisfying ways to kill people! Unfortunately everyone and their moms hack on this game. I know PC games that that is a common scenario but this game is the worst with it(excluding CS GO). Its lag is unbearable and honestly its not really any fun anymore. This is exactly why everyone is jumping off this bandwagon. I'm on my way out too now. If you plan to play seriously then this game will infuriate you unless you choose to purchase some of the hacks online. If you don't care about that stuff then you may still enjoy this game. I might take some games too seriously and thats my issue but I can't even enjoy this game anymore. Maybe everyone is not hacking but I can spend a whole 2 clips shooting at people that should be ez pz kills and then i just get slaughtered... I've been playing shooters on PC since Counter Strike 1.5 and I doubt I'm that garbage at shooters... but i digress I can't enjoy a game that just isn't fair to play anymore. RIP PUBG

review: This game is a good idea but overall it is horrible. So many glitches and cheating but that is only just the begining of problems in this God damn forsaken GAME. First of all I get "realistic" but this is far from realistic to the point that you can't even kill a guy with a x3 scope that is RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU. I do shoot terrible sometimes but not EVERY SINGLE TIME...I spend 30 hours on this game for nothing but I am more sad about the money I actually spend to buy this game which is 30 euros (in my opinion highly overpriced). The game is firstly not worth the money not even 15 euros (it's only expensive because of the popularity). All in all it could have been an amazing game (popularity aside) but things like this stupid things actually is what makes me hate it (PUBG Mobile at least has more realistic hit boxes and you can kill someone on close range). My grade if 4 out 10 disappointing and I don't recommend this game unless it has a ridiculous discount to like maybe 10 euros which we all know is never gonna happen.

review: Highly recommend this game. I run 65 90 fps on 2560 x 1440 everything on ultra and shadows on low. Does this game need a little work with optimization yes but remember it's early access and it's only been out for 9 months. Now keep this in mind it's in early access and already out on console. What does that tell you about this game? It's going somewhere! I use to be that H1z1 player but that game is nothing compared to this game. Yes there's a bit of lag but it clears up. This game actually takes skills to play and a decent PC setup. If you see people complaining about fps lag and such. There's always something that can fix it. Stop playing on a 4k 2560 x 1440 monitors that your pc cannot handle. Run it on 1920 x 1080 with high settings or just let your invidia driver program handle the optimization. Choose servers that are in your region instead of playing ones far away. Keep in mind of ping/weather for those regions could effect server lag. I for one would give it a 10/10 if they fixed the small lag and scripters. Hackers will always be in a game no matter what but nothing compared to h1z1 and csgo like my god there's a lot on those. So in this case I would give a 8.5/10. If you have anything less 1070 with an exception of the 980ti do not bother playing on high/ultra settings or if you have a bad cpu. A lot of people will be complaing because they expect to play them at those settings with knowing its in early access and that their pc's are pretty trash. You have to pay to play when it comes to the PcMasterRace.Rig Setup i7 6700K Processor16Gb Corsair Dominator Platinum 3000MHz DDR4 RamGTX 980Ti Gigabyte Windforce 3x Cooling Video CardASUS Maximus VIII Hero MotherboardCorsair RM1000i Power Supply (1000w)Corsair 760T Case512GB Samsung 950 Pro SSD1T WD HDDTT Nic C5 Cpu Cooler

review: Never had a Battle Royale game before only time I have played something like this was years ago on minecraft hunger games fun right. It's great people complaining about being able to run it and other bugs it's been out for a couple of weeks what do you expect you can even go to the creators website and they are updating and optimizing the game this next month or so and improving a lot of common bugs. What more do people want from a new creator and company.I have an i5 6500 1060 6GB and 16GB DDR4 In most areas I will get around 40 80 fps and in high density areas I can get 25+ I am only playing on medium and render high but like I said devs are updating as we're playing.Also I would recommend getting some of yours friends to buy this too it's a lot more fun playing as a group with people you know not with a fifty year old rusky rando.

review: My Very First Shooter and I picked a good one. I've heard some have described this one as a horror movie where everyone is the last survivor and everyone else is the monsters and that is definately true of single player where any noise is a potential opening for a quick death. But what describes both single player and the wacky hijinx of multiplayer is the force of Rogue like on game.Having a random plane path generally random loot random circle of death placement random red zone etc forces you to think on your feet gives opportunity and keeps things fresh hour after hour where death isn't a real drag as again Rogue like like you just reque. Gunned down in the beginning as you search two whole buildings and only find melee and smoke grenades? Smoke 5 dudes only to die on the move to the second circle? Die in a fingernail biting battle of inches for 2nd? Ya in ya out a multiplayer Shooter Roguelike all without killing skill or punishing new players.I like how the maps work with the little details of each settlement and the general design of each makes for some neat stories and strategies especially considering they're largely a collection of asset flips with some bespoke key features.There are problems. Performance issues still haunt the game like lag upon landing the far corners of the map are nearly useless to bother with since it's so far from a circle that's not in the same corner and the flipping of crates on the Steam marketplace while *quite* profitable (I've more than paid off the $30 entrance fee) is attracting cheaters that already are a bane to on line shooters despite Blue Hole's best efforts.So yeah it's flawed but it's incredibly addictive with its tamed simulation and mountains of tension. I can't wait until the new map is out and the hunt for my next Chicken Dinner to continue on a new map.

review: BE in mind that this is a pretty long paragraph soo yea...I am rewriting this review because it really is a terrible game. Player Unknown's Battle Grounds should never of been released because I feel cheated for my money here are some of my reason. I can go into 5 buildings find nothing except a pistol or crossy. Someone else can go into a Crap Shack and find an AR. That is so unbalanced. It should never be like that. One person able to go into a small building and find a Good gun where as the person who goes into the more buildings gets nothing. The toxic players Now im not really talking about what they say but more of what they do. If you are apart of a squad and there teammate is in DBNO state and you finish them off. Now I get it if you are down to like the last 25 but people just keep on doing it. You also get people who wait in a corner for 5 mintues because they are a sweaty tryhard My next point is the D Sync so many times I have been screwed over by it. I go around a corner 2 sec later dead. Peak a corner 2 sec later dead. Its happened time and time again. Spawns now this is kinda continuation of my first point. I hate how nothing spawns. This game is suppose to be fun and how are you suppose to do that with a Lv 1 vest and a smoke gerande. You also can't find a car for like ever sometimes makeing you have to run 10 marathons in one game. I mean this game is terribly executed in funny.
title: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
